prompt.heading: Prompt
prompt.placeholder: E.g., Rotoscope the dancer, isolate the car from the background, animate the character...

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our Rotoscoping feature

items.title: What is rotoscoping?
items.description: Rotoscoping is the process of isolating and animating subjects from video or image backgrounds, allowing for seamless integration into various projects.

items.title: Is WaveSpeed Rotoscoping free to use?
items.description: Yes! Each user receives 30 free credits daily, perfect for creating numerous isolated images. Additional credits can be earned through participation in our community.

items.title: Can I use the isolated content commercially?
items.description: Paid users can use isolated content for commercial projects. Free users may use it for personal purposes but cannot use it commercially.

items.title: How does privacy work with WaveSpeed?
items.description: All rotoscoping is done directly in your browser. Your images are never uploaded to our servers, ensuring complete privacy and security.

footer.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Projects?
footer.description: Start using WaveSpeed Rotoscoping today and experience the difference. No sign-up required.
